exec_loop_count_finished: Count-based loop for '{node_name}' finished after {iterations} iterations.
exec_loading_loop_state: DEBUG: Loading loop state for '{node_name}' (context: '{context_id}'). Starting from iteration: {start_iter}
exec_node_timeout_error: Timeout Exceeded: Node '{node_name}' ran for more than {seconds} seconds and was stopped.
gemini_provider_err_not_configured: Gemini Provider is not configured. Check for a valid GEMINI_API_KEY in Settings.
api_core_component_upload_error: Core components cannot be uploaded to the community repository.
api_contract_err_executor_not_requested: Error: The 'workflow_executor_service' was not requested by this module.
api_contract_err_eventbus_not_requested: Error: The 'event_bus' service was not requested, cannot publish event '{eventName}'.
api_contract_warn_trigger_no_ruleid: CRITICAL WARNING FOR TRIGGER '{triggerId}': Listener was created without a rule_id. This trigger will be unable to run a workflow.
permission_denied_detailed: Access Denied. The '{capability}' capability requires a '{required_tier}' license, but your current tier is '{user_tier}'.
permission_denied_secure_mode: Access Denied due to secure mode. Please check license file signature.
settings_load_error: Failed to load settings. Please try again.
settings_general_language_hint: Select the display language for the UI.
settings_general_theme_hint: Choose the visual theme of the application.
settings_general_recorder_path_hint: The default folder to save screen recordings.
settings_ai_text_model_hint: Select the default AI for text generation tasks.
settings_ai_gpu_layers_hint: Number of model layers to offload to GPU (-1 for all).
settings_ai_worker_timeout_hint: Max time to wait for a local model response.
settings_server_enable_webhook_hint: Allows external services to trigger workflows.
settings_server_webhook_port_hint: The port for the API/Webhook server to listen on.
settings_server_manage_variables_hint: Manage API Keys, credentials, and other secrets.
settings_advanced_enable_error_handler_h: If enabled, a specific workflow will run whenever any other workflow fails.
settings_advanced_error_preset_hint: Select the preset to execute on failure.
settings_account_user_hint: The user currently logged into the system.
settings_account_actions_hint: Activate a new license or deactivate on this machine.
about_vision_p1: FLOWORK is not just software. It is a blank canvas for your automation creativity. We believe that even the most complex ideas can be broken down into elegant and efficient visual workflows. Here, technical limitations dissolve into artistic challenges, allowing you to weave processes, data, and actions into a digital symphony that works tirelessly.
about_vision_p2: The name Synapse is the core of our philosophy. Like a synapse in the brain that connects millions of neurons to create a thought, FLOWORK.SYNAPSE connects every module—every idea—into a single, intelligent whole. Our mission is to empower creators, developers, and visionaries to turn ideas into reality, untethered by rigid lines of code.
about_team_intro: A great vision requires a solid team. Here we are, the initial builders who have dedicated our time and expertise to construct the foundation of FLOWORK.
about_team_quote_awenk: For me, FLOWORK is a living ecosystem. My job is to ensure its foundation is strong enough to support even the wildest ideas, today and in the future.
about_team_quote_imam: A platform is only as strong as its bridges to the outside world. I build those bridges, ensuring FLOWORK can connect and interact with any service or system you need.
about_team_quote_irzad: Every module is an atom. Small, focused, but possessing incredible power when combined to build limitless automation structures.
about_team_quote_teguh: Complex data is meaningless if it cannot be understood. I transform raw data into intuitive visuals, giving you full control and understanding of your automation orchestra.
about_thanks_intro: FLOWORK would never have been possible without the brilliant works of individuals, communities, and organizations worldwide. We stand on the shoulders of giants, and we humbly wish to express our deepest gratitude to:
about_thanks_javafx: For the guidance and fundamental inspiration over the years that shaped the initial concepts of FLOWORK's user interface.
about_thanks_gemini_desc: For being a sparring partner in development, analysis, and coding.
about_thanks_llama_desc: For opening the door to running advanced AI models locally.
about_thanks_whisper_desc: For providing accurate audio transcription technology.
about_thanks_ffmpeg_desc: The Swiss Army knife for all things video and audio.
about_thanks_github_desc: For being the home for our code and a platform for collaboration.
about_thanks_supabase_desc: For providing a powerful and scalable backend infrastructure.
about_community_intro: FLOWORK is more than a project; it's a movement. A community of thinkers, makers, and problem-solvers. We've built the foundation, and now we invite you to help build its future. Be more than just a user—become a contributor, an ideator, and part of the automation evolution.
about_contributors_desc: FLOWORK is an open source project that thrives on community contributions. Thank you to everyone who has contributed their time, skills, and ideas.
about_contributors_placeholder: The list of contributors will be displayed here.
about_donors_desc: Infinite thanks to the donors who have provided financial support, allowing us to continue innovating and developing FLOWORK.
about_donors_placeholder: The list of donors will be displayed here.
login_switch_text: Don't have an account? Sign up now
pricing_title: Choose the Right Plan for Your Ambition
pricing_subtitle: Start for free, upgrade anytime when you're ready.
payment_success_subtitle: Thank you! Your account has been upgraded. You now have access to all premium features according to your chosen plan.
payment_success_redirecting: You will be redirected back to the Designer in {countdown} seconds...
lock_overlay_message: You must register at least one Flowork Engine to use the Designer. This ensures the workflows you create have a place to be executed.
engines_description: This is the list of Flowork Engines connected to your account. Run an Engine on your server and use the provided token to connect it to the Flowork Cloud.
engines_empty_state_title: You don't have any registered engines yet.
engines_empty_state_subtitle: Click "Add New Engine" to get started.
engines_dialog_token_info: Store this token in a very safe place. **You will not be able to see it again after closing this dialog.**
engines_dialog_token_instructions: Add this token to the `flowork-core/data/engine.conf` file on your server, then restart the Flowork Engine.
engines_dialog_delete_text: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the engine **{engineName}**?
engines_prompt_new_name: Enter a name for your new Engine (e.g., Office Server):
engines_prompt_reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the token for the engine "{engineName}"? The old token will become invalid immediately.
engines_alert_register_fail: Failed to register engine. Check the console log for details or you may have reached your tier limit.
engines_alert_reset_fail: Failed to reset token. Check the console log for details.
engines_alert_delete_fail: Failed to delete engine. Check the console log for details.
settings_sync_description: Securely back up your presets, variables, and user data to the cloud. Your data is encrypted on your machine using your password before being uploaded. We can never access your data.
settings_sync_tier_req: This is a premium feature available for Creator tier and above.
settings_sync_dialog_password_label: Enter Your Login Password to Confirm
settings_sync_dialog_warning: Warning: Restoring will overwrite all current presets and variables on this engine. This action cannot be undone.
sharing_empty_list_links: No share links have been created for this workflow yet.
auth_login_switch_text: Don't have an identity? Create one
auth_login_key_placeholder: Enter your 12-word recovery phrase or your 0x... private key
auth_login_error_invalid: Invalid Private Key or Mnemonic Phrase.
auth_register_switch_text: Already have an identity? Import it
auth_register_help_1: Flowork uses a self-sovereign identity system. We will generate a unique cryptographic key for you. You are the only one who controls this key.
auth_register_help_2: Warning: We CANNOT recover your account if you lose your key.
auth_mnemonic_help: This is your 12-word recovery phrase (Mnemonic). It is the ONLY way to recover your identity. Store it somewhere safe and private.
auth_mnemonic_checkbox: I have securely written down and stored my recovery phrase.
articles_empty_list: You have not created any articles yet.
articles_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete '{title}'?
articles.headers.title: Title
articles_field_meta_description_hint: Recommended: 150-160 characters. This appears in search results.
